attributes.action: Ban The Use Of Animals In Circuses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ban any use of animals in circuses in the UK.
Animals are being mistreated and abused and it is not on.
The training methods, housing and transportation used by circuses are no where near the standard expected by the RSPCA and other animal welfare groups.
Cirsuses are not educational, as is the excuse of many.
Animals are not ours for entertainment.
This needs to stop.
